name: Phoenix
summary: Phoenix is an outer space-themed, fixed shooter video game released in arcades in 1980. According to Centuri's Joel Hochberg, the game was licensed from "a smaller Japanese developer." Amstar Electronics (which was located in Phoenix, Arizona) licensed the game to Centuri for manufacture in the United States. Taito released the game in Japan.
info:
• 发行: Centuri, Taito (街机), Atari, Inc. (Atari 2600)
  • 平台: Atari 2600
  • 平台: 街机
  • 游戏类型: STG
  • 游玩人数: 1~2人
  • 发行日期: 1980年
